subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marion Rolland of France raced to victory in the downhill, an event the Americans were favored to dominate at the Alpine world championships, even without the injured Lindsey Vonn.
snippet: Marion Rolland of France raced to victory in the downhill, an event the Americans were favored to dominate at the Alpine world championships, even without the injured Lindsey Vonn.
